minecraft:npc_dialogue.title: NPC Dialogue
minecraft:npc_dialogue.description: Specifies the dialogue of an npc.

buttons.title: Buttons
buttons.description: This is where you can create buttons for your NPC.

items.title: Button
items.description: This is where you can create buttons for your NPC.

name.title: Name
name.description: Set the text that is going to be displayed on your NPCâ€™s button.

commands.description: allows you to add commands which will be run in-game when the button is pressed.
commands.title: Commands

npc_name.title: NPC Name
npc_name.description: This is where you can add or change a name for your NPC dialogue box. This is an optional property that is useful for dynamically changing NPC names.

on_close_commands.description: This is where you can define which commands will fire when the NPC dialogue box closes.
on_close_commands.title: On Close Commands

on_open_commands.description: This is where you can define which commands will fire when the NPC dialogue box opens.
on_open_commands.title: On Close Commands

scene_tag.title: Scene Tag
scene_tag.description: This is the name you will use to call this scene in-game. This is a required property.

text.title: Text
text.description: This is where you enter the dialogue you want your NPC to display in-game for this scene. You can type the dialogue text directly here or use raw text if you are using a language file. This is an optional property, but without it your NPC dialogue box will be empty.

A.title: Format Version
A.description: A version that tells minecraft what type of data format can be expected when reading this file.

B_rawtext.title: Rawtext
B_rawtext.description: The raw text component, which consists of an array of text components.

B_selector.title: Selector
B_selector.description: A text component that turns a selector into text, will usually display like: `Player1, Player2 and Player3`.

selector.title: Selector
selector.description: The selector to target, for dialogue files, you can use @initiator.

B_score.title: Score
B_score.description: A text component that grabs the score from an given target and turns its value of a specified score.

name.title: Selector
name.description: A selector, player name (can be fake), or * to target who is reading the message.

objective.title: Objective
objective.description: The scoreboard objective to retrieve the value of.

B_text.title: Text
B_text.description: A simple text component, will display the text raw (without processing).

B_translate.title: Translate
B_translate.description: A text component that will attempt to translate the given key through the languages files.

B_with.title: With
B_with.description: Specifies for the translator that additional text component needs to be inserted, this will cause the translator to look for variables in the translation text and replaced them with the corresponding 'With' text component.

oneOf.title: Rawtext
oneOf.description: Specifies that this 'with' component needs to be processed.

B.title: RawText
B.description: A json structure that allows for translations, or go from scores and selectors to text.
